citations.narrative:
There is a section of metal frame at the base of the shelter structure along the left wall that is rusted through with a few
holes and cracks showing. This section of wall should be replaced to keep the shelter structurally sound and in good
repair for the safety of the animal.
Correct by: July 29, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a section of metal frame at the base of the shelter structure along the left wall that is rusted through with a few 
holes and cracks showing. This section of wall should be replaced to keep the shelter structurally sound and in good 
repair for the safety of the animal. 
 
Correct by: July 29, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
